content.text:
# Gaumee Film Award for Best Female Playback Singer

The Gaumee Film Award for Best Female Playback Singer is given as part of the Gaumee Film Awards for Maldivian films.
The award was first given in 1994. Here is a list of the award winners and the nominees of the respective award ceremonies.

! Superlative
! Actor
! Record
|-
| Most awards
| Shifa Thaufeeq
|style="text-align: center;"| 4
|-

| Shifa ThaufeeqMariyam Ashfa
|style="text-align: center;"| 6
|-
| Most nominations in a single year
| Mariyam Ashfa
|style="text-align: center;"| 3
|-
| Most consecutive year nominations
| Mariyam Ashfa
|style="text-align: center;"| 4
|-
| Most nominations without ever winning
| Mariyam Ashfa
|style="text-align: center;"| 6

| Shifa Thaufeeq
|style="text-align: center;"| 43

| Shifa Thaufeeq
|style="text-align: center;"| 44
|-

| Mariyam Rifqa Rasheed
|style="text-align: center;"| 25
|-
| Youngest nominee
| Aishath Maain Rasheed
|style="text-align: center;"| 18
|-
|}
